name: Paket
help:
Paket is a dependency manager for .NET and mono projects, which is designed to work well with NuGet packages and also enables referencing files directly from Git repositories or any HTTP resource. It enables precise and predictable control over what packages the projects within your application reference.

If you want to learn how to use Paket then read the Getting started tutorial and take a look at the FAQs.

If you are already using NuGet for package management in your solution then you can learn about the upgrade process in the convert from NuGet section.

properties.name: PackageId
properties.help: NuGet package ID.

properties.name: PackageVersion
properties.help: Dependency version constraint.

properties.name: DependencyGroup
properties.help: Dependency group to update. Default is all groups.

properties.name: CreateNewBindingFiles
properties.help: Creates binding redirect files if needed.

properties.name: Force
properties.help: Force download and reinstallation of all dependencies.

properties.name: Redirects
properties.help: Create binding redirects.

properties.name: CleanRedirects
properties.help: Remove binding redirects that were not created by Paket.

properties.name: NoInstall
properties.help: Do not modify projects.

properties.name: KeepMajor
properties.help: Only allow updates that preserve the major version.

properties.name: KeepMinor
properties.help: Only allow updates that preserve the minor version.

properties.name: KeepPatch
properties.help: Only allow updates that preserve the patch version.

properties.name: Filter
properties.help: Treat the NuGet package ID as a regex to filter packages.

properties.name: TouchAffectedReferences
properties.help: Touch project files referencing affected dependencies, to help incremental build tools detecting the change.

properties.name: Force
properties.help: Force download and reinstallation of all dependencies.

properties.name: OnlyReferenced
properties.help: Only restore packages that are referenced by paket.references files.

properties.name: TouchAffectedRefs
properties.help: Touches project files referencing packages which are being restored, to help incremental build tools detecting the change.

properties.name: IgnoreChecks
properties.help: Do not check if paket.dependencies and paket.lock are in sync.

properties.name: FailOnChecks
properties.help: Abort if any checks fail.

properties.name: DependencyGroup
properties.help: Restore dependencies of a single group.

properties.name: ProjectFile
properties.help: Restore dependencies of a single project.

properties.name: ReferencesFiles
properties.help: Restore packages from a paket.references file.

properties.name: TargetFramework
properties.help: Restore only for the specified target framework.

properties.name: File
properties.help: Path to the package.

properties.name: Url
properties.help: URL of the NuGet feed.

properties.name: ApiKey
properties.help: API key for the URL. Default is the <c>NUGET_KEY</c> environment variable.

properties.name: Endpoint
properties.help: API endpoint to push to. Default is /api/v2/package.

properties.name: OutputDirectory
properties.help: Output directory for .nupkg files.

properties.name: BuildConfiguration
properties.help: Build configuration that should be packaged. Default is Release.

properties.name: BuildPlatform
properties.help: Build platform that should be packaged. Default is check all known platform targets.

properties.name: PackageVersion
properties.help: Version of the package.

properties.name: TemplateFile
properties.help: Pack a single paket.template file.

properties.name: Exclude
properties.help: Exclude paket.template file by package ID.

properties.name: SpecificVersions
properties.help: Package IDs with version numbers.

properties.name: ReleaseNotes
properties.help: Specify release notes for the package.

properties.name: LockDependencies
properties.help: Use version requirements from paket.lock instead of paket.dependencies.

properties.name: MinimumFromLockFile
properties.help: Use version requirements from paket.lock instead of paket.dependencies, and add them as a minimum version. <c>--lock-dependencies</c> will over-ride this option.

properties.name: PinProjectReferences
properties.help: Pin dependencies generated from project references (=) instead of using minimum (>=) for version specification.  If <c>--lock-dependencies</c> is specified, project references will be pinned even if this option is not specified.

properties.name: Symbols
properties.help: Build symbol/source packages in addition to library/content packages.

properties.name: IncludeReferencedProjects
properties.help: Include symbol/source from referenced projects.

properties.name: ProjectUrl
properties.help: Url to the projects home page.

commonTaskProperties.name: Verbose
commonTaskProperties.help: Print detailed information to the console.

commonTaskProperties.name: FromBootstrapper
commonTaskProperties.help: Call coming from the <c>--run</c> feature of the bootstrapper.
